funny.quote: When life gives you lemons, squirt someone in the eye.
Don't be so humble - you are not that great.
Never miss a good chance to shut up.
If at first you don't succeed then skydiving definitely isn't for you.
To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
When I was growing up I always wanted to be someone. Now I realize I should have been more specific.
The planet is fine. The people are f***ed.
If at first you don't succeed, then skydiving definitely isn't for you.
Don't worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.
When I hear somebody sigh, Life is hard, I am always tempted to ask, Compared to what?
If you think you are too small to be effective, you have never been in the dark with a mosquito.
Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won't expect it back.
Be like a postage stamp. Stick to a thing till you get there.
It's okay to look at the past and the future. Just don't stare.
Hating people is like burning down your own home to get rid of a rat.
Wisdom comes from experience. Experience is often a result of lack of wisdom.
I figured something out. The future is unpredictable.
A mind is like a parachute. It doesn't work if it is not open.
Aspire to inspire before we expire.

motivational.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.
When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.

I want to be in the arena. I want to be brave with my life. And when we make the choice to dare greatly, we sign up to get our asses kicked. We can choose courage or we can choose comfort, but we can't have both. Not at the same time.
If you have good thoughts they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely.
We are not our best intentions. We are what we do.
When we let fear be our master, we cannot be happy and free as a butterfly. But when we choose to trust the journey and embrace love and joy, we are free to fly.
Trying to grow up is hurting. You make mistakes. You try to learn from them, and when you don't, it hurts even more.
Do what you feel in your heart to be right - for you'll be criticized anyway.
Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art.... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things which give value to survival.
Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

change.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
Change will not come if we wait for some other person, or if we wait for some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
Taking a new step, uttering a new word, is what people fear most.
Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge.
No matter who you are, no matter what you did, no matter where you've come from, you can always change, become a better version of yourself.
True life is lived when tiny changes occur.
Change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
To change ourselves effectively, we first had to change our perceptions.
The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
Change is hardest at the beginning, messiest in the middle and best at the end.
People can cry much easier than they can change.
Change almost never fails because it's too early. It almost always fails because it's too late.
Man cannot remake himself without suffering, for he is both the marble and the sculptor
It's only after you've stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.
Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
The present changes the past. Looking back you do not find what you left behind.
I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the waters to create many ripples.
Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.
We are products of our past, but we don't have to be prisoners of it.
Any change, even a change for the better, is always accompanied by drawbacks and discomforts.
Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
Taking a new step, uttering a new word, is what people fear most.
Nothing is as painful to the human mind as a great and sudden change.
Change is inevitable. Change is constant
When you're finished changing, you're finished.

love.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
All your life, you will be faced with a choice. You can choose love or hate…I choose love.
The greatest pleasure of life is love.
If you want to be loved, be lovable.
Where there is love, there is life.
If you find it in your heart to care for somebody else, you will have succeeded
Love in its essence is spiritual fire.
I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
We are most alive when we're in love.
Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
Love is a friendship set to music.
To the world you may be one person, but to one person you are the world.
The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.
Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
You have to grow, you have to be, you have to love yourself unconditionally.
Love yourself and dream bigger.
When admiring other people's gardens, don't forget to tend to your own flowers.
You can never meet your potential until you truly learn to love yourself.
The absence of self-love can never be replaced with the presence of people's love for you.

time.quote: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
Don't waste your time in anger, regrets, worries, and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy.
Time is what we want most, but… what we use worst.
Time is a created thing. To say "I don't have time," is like saying, "I don't want to."
No use thinking of the past for its gone, don't think of the future because it has to come, think of the present because that's where you are.
Time is free, but it's priceless. You can't own it, but you can use it. You can't keep it, but you can spend it. Once you've lost it you can never get it back.
The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
Lost time is never found again.
Time is an equal opportunity employer, but how we treat time is not equal.
The time that leads to mastery is dependent on the intensity of our focus.
Never waste a minute thinking about people you don't like.
There are no refunds on misspent time.
The future is uncertain but the end is always near.
Lack of time is actually a lack of priorities.
All great achievements require time.
You cannot always wait for the perfect time. Sometimes you must dare to jump.
Though time is a gift, we often dismiss its fleetingness or use it for our own pleasure.

education.quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.
Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
The learning process continues until the day you die.
Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
A person who won't read has no advantage over one who can't read.
They know enough who know how to learn.
Education is a better safeguard of liberty than a standing army.
Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
Learning is not compulsory. Neither is survival.
Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
Intelligence plus character-that is the goal of true education.
Everyone you will ever meet knows something you don't.
You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.
Children have to be educated, but they have also to be left to educate themselves.
Wisdom…. comes not from age, but from education and learning.
Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
The more I live, the more I learn. The more I learn, the more I realize, the less I know.
Only the educated are free.
Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.

truth.quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
The time is always right to do what is right.
The truth is rarely pure and never simple.
A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
The truth will set you free, but first it will piss you off.

Above all, don't lie to yourself. The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he cannot distinguish the truth within him, or around him, and so loses all respect for himself and for others. And having no respect he ceases to love.
In a time of deceit telling the truth is a revolutionary act.
Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
Tell the truth, or someone will tell it for you.
If you do not tell the truth about yourself you cannot tell it about other people.
No persons are more frequently wrong, than those who will not admit they are wrong.
The truth will set you free. But not until it is finished with you.
Better a cruel truth than a comfortable delusion.
Most men would rather deny a hard truth than face it.
There are two ways to be fooled. One is to believe what isn't true; the other is to refuse to believe what is true
Truth never damages a cause that is just.
Wrong does not cease to be wrong because the majority share in it.
I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you.

life.quote: Be mindful. Be grateful. Be positive. Be true. Be kind.
The minute you settle for less than you deserve, you get even less than you settled for.
The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
Life just doesn't hand you things. You have to get out there and make things happen. that's the exciting part.
Be a bush if you can't be a tree. If you can't be a highway, just be a trail. If you can't be a sun, be a star. For it isn't by size that you win or fail. Be the best of whatever you are.
You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.

You build on failure. You use it as a stepping stone. Close the door on the past. You don't try to forget the mistakes, but you don't dwell on it. You don't let it have any of your energy, or any of your time, or any of your space.
Life is not a spectator sport. If you're going to spend your whole life in the grandstand just watching what goes on, in my opinion you're wasting your life.
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
Life's as kind as you let it be.
The things you do for yourself are gone when you are gone, but the things you do for others remain as your legacy.
It is difficult, when faced with a situation you cannot control, to admit you can do nothing.
There are times to stay put, and what you want will come to you, and there are times to go out into the world and find such a thing for yourself.
We must be willing to let go of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
Life doesn't get easier or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.
Hold yourself responsible for a higher standard than anybody else expects of you. Never excuse yourself. Never pity yourself. Be a hard master to yourself-and be lenient to everybody else.

Do the things that interest you and do them with all your heart. Don't be concerned about whether people are watching you or criticizing you. The chances are that they aren't paying any attention to you. It's your attention to yourself that is so stultifying. But you have to disregard yourself as completely as possible. If you fail the first time then you'll just have to try harder the second time. After all, there's no real reason why you should fail. Just stop thinking about yourself.
I believe we are here on the planet Earth to live, grow up and do what we can to make this world a better place for all people to enjoy freedom.
Life is either a great adventure or nothing.
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence; then success is sure.
Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
Don't settle for what life gives you; make life better and build something.
In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: It goes on.
If you can do what you do best and be happy, you're further along in life than most people.
Never take life seriously. Nobody gets out alive anyway.
You're not defined by your past; you're prepared by it. You're stronger, more experienced, and you have greater confidence.
You choose the life you live. If you don't like it, it's on you to change it because no one else is going to do it for you.
Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass, it's about learning to dance in the rain.
